Direzione o partecipazione a comitati ed.content: Member of the Editorial Board of the journal CIRIEC JOURNAL OF PUBLIC; SOCIAL AND COOPERATIVE ECONOMY

Editor of the HANDBOOK OF GAME THEORY AND INDUSTRIAL ORGANIZATION, Edward Elgar, Cheltenham, UK and Northampton, MA, in production with the publisher (with Luis Corchon, University Carlos III, Madrid, Spain).
Editor-in-chief of ANNALS OF PUBLIC AND COOPERATIVE ECONOMICS, Blackwell- Wiley, international journal founded in 1908.

Organizzazione o partecipazione come rel.content: SELECTED CONFERENCE PARTECIPATION AS SPEAKER (in ordine cronologico inverso): 1. 43rd EARIE (European Association for Research in Industrial Economics) Annual Conference - Lisbon, Portugal, 26-28 August 2016 http://www.earie2016.org/ | http://earie2016.earie.org/ - Host: Nova School of Business and Economics (Nova SBE); 2. International CIRIEC Scientific Meeting, June 2015, Lisbon, Portugal; 3. International CIRIEC Scientific Meeting, June 2013, October 24-26, Antwerpen, Belgium; 4. 38th EARIE Annual Conference - Stockholm, Sweden / 1-3 September 2011 http://www.earie2011.org/ Hosts: Royal Institute of Technology (KTH) & Stockholm School of Economics (SSE); 5. SING (Spanish Italian Netherland) Conference in Game Theory, Paris August 2011; 6. 37th EARIE Annual Conference - Istanbul, Turkey / 2-4 September 2010, Host: Sabanci University, Faculty of Arts and Social Sciences / Venue: Grand Hyatt Regency; 7. SING (Spanish, Italian and Netherland Game Theory Conference), Foggia, Italy, July, 2006; 8. 15th Italian and Spanish Meeting on Game Thoery and Applications, University of Urbino, July 9.12, 2003. 9. MDEF (Modelli Dinamici in Economia e Finanza), Conference, University of Urbino, September 26-28, 2002. 10. Conference on Transport Pricing Acceptability, Dresden, Germany, May 2002; 11. 1st International Conference in Game Theory, Bilbao, Spain, 22‐26 July 2000; 12. 10th IAFEP Conference (International Association for the Economics of Participation), Trento 4‐6 July 2000 (also in the local organizing committee); 13. 26th EARIE Annual Conference - Torino, Italy / 4-7 September 1999 Host: University of Turin; 14. 24th EARIE Annual Conference - Leuven, Belgium / 31 August–3 September 1997, Host: Catholic University of Leuven (UCL). 15. 12th EEA (European Economic Association Annual Conference), Toulouse, France August 27-30, 1997. 16. 14th IAFEP (International Association of Economics of Participation) Conference, August 1996, Prague, Checz Republique;
Invited talk at Columbia Business School, New York, September 1998 (talks in honor of Jaroslav Vanek);
Invited talk at the University of Namur, Belgium, October 2002 for Center of Research in Economics and Development Center (CRED);
Invited seminar at the Management Department London School of Economics, September 2004
Invited seminar at Department of Economics University of Venice, June 2011
Invited seminar at Department of Organization and Economics of Institutions University of Graz, September2011

Scientific Organizer of the Workshop on ""MIcronomics and Management of Social Enterprises", March 1 2013, University of Rome La Sapienza, under the behalf of CIRIEC INTERNATIONAL Scientific Commission on Social and Cooperative Economy".
Member of the Scientific Committee of the International conference "Social Economy on the Move...at the Crossroads of Structural Change and Regulation", University of Antwerp, October 24-26, 2013.

Scientific Organizer (jointly with Christian Ewherart and Attila Tasnadi) of international conference: Oligo Workshop 2014, June 5-6, 2014, (workshop devoted to the optimal firm behavior and game-theoretic modeling of competition), Sapienza University of Rome, with 34 international speakers and Jean Gabszewicz as keynote speaker.

Scientific organizer (jointly with Luis Corchon, Christian Ewherart and Attila Tasnadi) of the international conference: Oligo Workshop 2015, June 1-3, 2015 (workshop devoted to the optimal firm behavior and game-theoretic modeling of competition) at the University Carlos III of Madrid (41 international speakers and Luis Cabral as keynote speaker).

Scientific organizer (jointly with Luis Corchon, David Ettinger, Christian Ewherart and Attila Tasnadi) of the international conference: Oligo Workshop 2016, June 6-7, 2016 (workshop devoted to the optimal firm behavior and game-theoretic modeling of competition) at the University Paris Dauphine, Paris, France (41 international speakers and Giancarlo Spagnolo as keynote speaker).

Responsabilita' di studi e ricerche scie.content: Coordinatore del gruppo di ricerca internazionale creato dalla Commissione Scientifica del CIRIEC Internazionale (Centre International de Recherches et d'Information sur l' Economie Publique, Sociale et Cooperative) con sede a Liegi, Belgio, sul tema: "Organization and Governance in Social Economy Enterprises" (see the website http://www.ciriec.ulg.ac.be/en/research/ commission-es/themes-en-cours/organisati on-et-gouvernance-dans-les-entreprises-d economie-sociale/). Il gruppo ha prodotto due special issues del journal ANNALS OF PUBLIC AND COOPERATIVE ECONOMICS: 1. "Organization and Governance in Social Economy Enterprises" (guest editors Michael Kopel Graz University, Austria and Marco Marini, Univ. Sapienza, Roma) - Annals of Public and Cooperative Economics, 87, 3, 2016) 2. "Governance of Non-Profit and Non-Governmental Organizations - Within- and Between- Organization Analyses" (with Gani Aldahev, ECARES, Université Libre de Brussels, Belgium Marco Marini, Univ. Sapienza, Roma and Thierry Verdier, Paris School of Economics, France), Annals of Public and Cooperative Economics, 86, 1, 2015.

Conseguimento di premi e riconoscimenti.content: Winner of the European Commission "Human Capital and Mobility European Doctoral Fellowship #ERBCHBICT930281 for enrolling in the European Doctoral Programme, started at CORE Louvain-la-Neuve, Belgium and after concluded with the obtainment of a Ph.D. in Economics at the London school of Economics and Political Science, London, UK in 1998.
Winner of a European Fellowship Grant at the London School of Economics and Political Science.

Research Fellow and Member of the Scientific Commission of Social and Cooperative Economy of the CIRIEC INTERNATIONAL (Centre International de Recherches et d'Information sur l' Economie Publique, Sociale et Cooperative) LIEGE, BELGIUM.

Formale attribuzione di incarichi di ins.content: Teaching Assistant, Economics Department, London School of Economics, London.
Lecturer in Economics, Economics Department, London School of Economics and Political Science.
Lecturer in Incentives and Governance in Organisations (MSc), Management Department, London School of Economics, London.

Direzione o partecipazione alle attivit\.content: Partecipante al Programma di ricerca PRIN 1999 con l'Università Politecnica delle MARCHE (Coordinatore scientifico nazionale: MAROTTA Giuseppe) 9913171517_002 AREA 13 Durata: 24 mesi. Titolo: SISTEMI FINANZIARI, CRESCITA REGIONALE E FINANZIAMENTO DELLE PICCOLE E MEDIE IMPRESE

Partecipante al Programma di ricerca PRIN 2002 Università degli Studi di NAPOLI "Federico II" (Coordinatore scientifico nazionale PATRONE Fioravante, Università di Genova) 2002012311_002 Area 01 Durata 24 mesi Titolo Soluzioni approssimate e buona posizione per problemi gerarchici e selezioni di equilibri di Nash Decorrenza 16/12/2002 - Consuntivo 18/01/2005

Partecipante al Programma di ricerca PRIN 2003 per Università "Ca' Foscari" VENEZIA, Coordinatore scientifico nazionale DI MAURO Carmela 2003130348_004 Area 13 Durata 24 mesi Titolo Le conseguenze della presenza di 'unforeseen contingencies' e comportamenti di reciprocita' per contratti, mercati finanziari e la stabilita' sociale. Decorrenza 20/11/2003 Consuntivo 15/12/2005

Partecipante al Programma di ricerca PRIN 2008 con l'Università di URBINO "Carlo Bo" (Coordinatore scientifico nazionale COLETTI Giulianella) Ateneo/Ente Università degli Studi di Urbino Carlo Bo 2008JNWWBP_004 Area 13 Durata 24 mesi Titolo Modelli e Calcolo Fuzzy per le Decisioni Economiche e Finanziarie . Decorrenza 22/03/2010 Scadenza 22/09/2012

Partecipante al Programma di ricerca PRIN 2010-2011 con Università degli Studi di ROMA "La Sapienza" (Coordinatore scientifico nazionale GALEOTTI Marzio Domenico 2010S2LHSE_009 Area 13 Titolo I cambiamenti climatici nell'area del Mediterraneo: scenari evolutivi, impatti economici, politiche di mitigazione e innovazione tecnologica Decorrenza 01/02/2013 Scadenza 01/02/2016

Responsabilita' scientifica per progetti.content: Responsabile Scientifico del progetto SECOIA (2015/2016) commissionato sulla base di un bando pubblico europeo che richiedeva peer review e assegnatoci dalla regione Vallone del Belgio "relative à l’élaboration d’une étude portant sur l’analyse et l’évaluation de l’impact social des entreprises d’économie sociale", telle que définie dans le Cahier Spécial des Charges CSC n° O6.03.03-15K09 de la Région wallonne – SPW." Report: "An Overview of Some Recent Works Concerning the Italian Cooperatives’ Impact on Society"
